message.content:
Day 1:
Breakfast: Oatmeal with fresh fruits (banana, strawberries) and a drizzle of maple syrup.
Lunch: Quinoa salad with mixed vegetables, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, olives, and olive oil dressing.
Dinner: Baked chicken breast with steamed broccoli and sweet potato mash.
Snacks: Fresh fruits (apple or pear) and a handful of sunflower seeds.

Day 2:
Breakfast: Scrambled tofu with spinach, tomatoes, and onions. Serve with whole-grain toast.
Lunch: Lentil soup with mixed vegetables and quinoa.
Dinner: Grilled salmon with steamed asparagus and brown rice.
Snacks: Fresh fruits (pear or orange) and a handful of pumpkin seeds.

Day 3:
Breakfast: Avocado toast on whole-grain bread, topped with cherry tomatoes and fresh basil leaves.
Lunch: Veggie stir fry with mixed vegetables, tofu, and brown rice.
Dinner: Baked cod with steamed zucchini noodles and a side of roasted bell peppers.
Snacks: Fresh fruits (kiwi or pineapple) and a handful of walnuts.

Day 4:
Breakfast: Smoothie made from mixed berries, banana, coconut milk, and chia seeds.
Lunch: Chickpea salad with mixed vegetables, olives, and tahini dressing.
Dinner: Grilled chicken breast with roasted carrots and cauliflower rice.
Snacks: Fresh fruits (mango or peach) and a handful of pistachios.

Day 5:
Breakfast: Chia seed pudding made from almond milk, chia seeds, and vanilla extract. Top with fresh berries.
Lunch: Quinoa salad with mixed vegetables, chickpeas, and lemon tahini dressing.
Dinner: Grilled shrimp skewers with steamed broccoli and quinoa.
Snacks: Fresh fruits (grapefruit or melon) and a handful of almonds.

Day 6:
Breakfast: Scrambled tofu with spinach, tomatoes, onions, and whole-grain toast.
Lunch: Veggie wrap with mixed vegetables, hummus, avocado, and lettuce.
Dinner: Baked chicken breast with steamed asparagus and sweet potato mash.
Snacks: Fresh fruits (apple or pear) and a handful of sunflower seeds.

Day 7:
Breakfast: Smoothie made from mixed berries, banana, coconut milk, and chia seeds.
Lunch: Chickpea salad with mixed vegetables, olives, and tahini dressing.
Dinner: Grilled salmon with steamed zucchini noodles and a side of roasted bell peppers.
Snacks: Fresh fruits (kiwi or pineapple) and a handful of walnuts.
